Quickstrike:





Quickstrike listened on to the heated argument between Dark Mouse and 
Phobia. It sounded serious, and it could lead to a dangerous situation for 
all of them. He slowly go up and stumbled to the side of the mouth of the 
cave.

"What's goin' on?" he mumbled, leaning against a wall.
